lines.text: The uterus is completely destroyed. All that mathematics was too much for your body.

[her last words]
Death makes the fragility of life delicious. In general, I'm not opposed to it.
lines.character: Ada Augusta Byron King, Countess of Lovelace

lines.text: I'm not at all certain that half a life is better than no life at all.
lines.character: Ada Augusta Byron King, Countess of Lovelace
